projects.name: Stock Performance
projects.description: Stock performance is a web application to check out performance by company to see which one performs the best, based on an external API provided by Financial Modeling Prep. Built with Ract, Redux, and SCSS.
projects.descriptionPopup: Stock performance is a web application to check out performance by company to see which one performs the best, based on an external API provided by Financial Modeling Prep. Built with Ract, Redux, and SCSS.

projects.name: Buget App
projects.description: Budget app is a mobile web application where you can manage your budget: you have a list of transactions associated with a category, so that you can see how much money you spent and on what.
projects.descriptionPopup: Budget app is a mobile web application where you can manage your budget: you have a list of transactions associated with a category, so that you can see how much money you spent and on what.

projects.name: Taste Food
projects.description: The Taste food web app is our JavaScript capstone project. Taste food is a web application based on an external food API, showing data about Italian foods and we used Used involvement API to record the different user interactions (likes, comments).
projects.descriptionPopup: The Taste food web app is our JavaScript capstone project. Taste food is a web application based on an external food API, showing data about Italian foods and we used Used involvement API to record the different user interactions (likes, comments).
